comments_since_last_sample.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
My dog is going Full cop mode
I feel like it would get ruined in the water...
My fish are sitting on the counter gasping, please advise urgently

Just make sure it’s big enough to contain your cat or a dog during the holiday season lol.

just kidding. I kid. I would never stuff my cat or dog into an aquarium just because they destroy everything.
This is an oddly specific LPT.

Wait... this is an actual LPT that actually tells me something that might be useful.  It's not telling me how to scam anyone and it's not asking me to judge others. 

You must be new here.

Just kidding, thanks for the actual useful tip.
Guess I'll throw my fish away
The LPT I never knew I needed.
